feed.title: The Oswalds
feed.subtitle: The adventures of Osvita and Osmond Oswald. Follow these tiny explorers to their favourite weird and wonderful hidden spots around the globe.

entry.title: Episode 2
entry.content:
GET A ROOM!

IF YOU EXPECTED A ROMANTIC BEDROOM SCENE IN THIS EPISODE YOU HAVEN´T MET THE OSWALDS YET!

AFTER THEIR DJ-SET OSVITA AND OSMOND RETURN TO THEIR COZY HOMEBASE BUT IT´S GETTING TROPICALLY HOT IN THEIR SLEEPINGROOM AND WEIRD DREAMS AND STRANGE NOISES FROM INSIDE THE CUPBOARD ARE KEEPING OUR FAVORITE LITTLE COUPLE AWAKE…

HOOKED WITH THE SOUNDTRACK OF THIS EPISODE? FIND THE COMPLETE GET A ROOM! PLAYLIST ON SPOTIFY!

entry.title: Episode 1
entry.content:
Looks like today - Sounds like yesterday

How would you imagine the Oswalds to celebrate a dance party? It’s wild, it’s loud and it’s rock’n’roll!

Enter the smallest psychedelic 60ies Club across the planet and be prepared for a fuzzy and raw garage rock dj-set inferno with some strange and unexpected party guests!

Find the complete OO7 DJ-Set on the Oswald’s Spotify Account! (Or direct to the playlist).


(Direct link to Vimeo)
entry.summary: Looks like today - Sounds like yesterday
